body_html: We probably don't want any references to android.hardware.Camera or android.hardware.Camera2 in the Activity classes, apart from CameraActivity. Right now there are 3 methods in each activity for handling incoming frames -- I think we can reduce that to 1 if possible and let CameraActivity itself handle supporting the different camera hardwares.

body: We probably don't want any references to android.hardware.Camera or android.hardware.Camera2 in the Activity classes, apart from CameraActivity. Right now there are 3 methods in each activity for handling incoming frames -- I think we can reduce that to 1 if possible and let CameraActivity itself handle supporting the different camera hardwares.
